mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS, LOCAL_CODE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMNO.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberName}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{localCode} )
INSERT INTO TB_MEMBERGENRE VALUES ( SEQ_MEMNO.CURRVAL, (SELECT GENRE_CODE FROM TB_GENRE WHERE GENRE_NAME = #{genreName}))
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO memberNo, MEMBER_ID memberId, MEMBER_PWD memberPwd, MEMBER_NAME memberName, TO_CHAR(BIRTHDAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BIRTHDAY, GENDER, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS, ENROLL_DATE enrollDate, STATUS, PRIVILEGE, LOCATION_NAME localName FROM TB_MEMBER JOIN TB_LOCATION ON(LOCAL_CODE = LOCATION_CODE) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_PWD = #{memberPwd} AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT GENRE_NAME FROM TB_MEMBER JOIN TB_MEMBERGENRE ON(MEMBER_NO = MEM_NO) JOIN TB_GENRE USING(GENRE_CODE) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_PWD = #{memberPwd} AND STATUS = 'Y'
